short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lots of modifications to Synergy StudentVUE!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Please Note: When installing Synergy Addons for Google Chromeâ„¢, you will receive a warning that Synergy Addons will receive access to your browsing history and data. This is a standard message - we NEVER collect any user information.

Our Synergy Addons extension adds new features to Synergy StudentVUE, which is a student dashboard.
